Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KAKUTEI_KBN WHEN 1 THEN '確定' WHEN 2 THEN '未確定' ELSE '' END
CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.DAIKAN_KBN WHEN 1 THEN '自社' WHEN 2 THEN '他社' ELSE '' END

Column.DispName: 売上伝票毎消費税外税
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_TAX_SOTO + T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.HINMEI_URIAGE_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 売上伝票毎消費税内税
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_TAX_UCHI + T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.HINMEI_URIAGE_TAX_UCHI_TOTAL ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 売上明細毎消費税外税合計
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL + T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.HINMEI_URIAGE_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 売上明細毎消費税内税合計
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_TAX_UCHI_TOTAL + T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.HINMEI_URIAGE_TAX_UCHI_TOTAL ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 支払伝票毎消費税外税
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO + T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.HINMEI_SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 支払伝票毎消費税内税
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_TAX_UCHI + T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.HINMEI_SHIHARAI_TAX_UCHI_TOTAL ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 支払明細毎消費税外税合計
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL + T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.HINMEI_SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 支払明細毎消費税内税合計
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_TAX_UCHI_TOTAL + T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.HINMEI_SHIHARAI_TAX_UCHI_TOTAL ELSE 0 END
CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN '伝票毎' WHEN 2 THEN '請求毎' WHEN 3 THEN '明細毎' ELSE '' END
CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN '外税' WHEN 2 THEN '内税' WHEN 3 THEN '非課税' ELSE '' END
CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN '伝票毎' WHEN 2 THEN '精算毎' WHEN 3 THEN '明細毎' ELSE '' END
CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN '外税' WHEN 2 THEN '内税' WHEN 3 THEN '非課税' ELSE '' END
CASE T_SEIKYUU_DETAIL1.DENPYOU_SHURUI_CD WHEN 2 THEN '締済' ELSE '未締' END
CASE T_SEISAN_DETAIL1.DENPYOU_SHURUI_CD WHEN 2 THEN '締済' ELSE '未締' END
CASE T_ZAIKO_UKEIRE_DETAIL1.DENSHU_KBN_CD WHEN 2 THEN '締済' ELSE '未締' END
CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_MUST_KBN WHEN 1 THEN '有' ELSE '無' END
CASE WHEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_MUST_KBN = 1 THEN (CASE WHEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_DATE IS NULL THEN '未検収' ELSE '検収済' END) ELSE '検収不要' END

Column.DispName: 検収売上伝票毎消費税外税
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_URIAGE_TAX_SOTO ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 検収売上伝票毎消費税内税
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_URIAGE_TAX_UCHI ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 検収売上明細毎消費税外税合計
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_URIAGE_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 検収売上明細毎消費税内税合計
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_URIAGE_TAX_UCHI_TOTAL ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 検収品名別売上金額合計
Column.Name: KENSHU_HINMEI_URIAGE_KINGAKU_TOTAL

Column.DispName: 検収品名別売上消費税外税合計
Column.Name: KENSHU_HINMEI_URIAGE_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL

Column.DispName: 検収品名別売上消費税内税合計
Column.Name: KENSHU_HINMEI_URIAGE_TAX_UCHI_TOTAL

Column.DispName: 検収支払伝票毎消費税外税
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 検収支払伝票毎消費税内税
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_SHIHARAI_TAX_UCHI ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 検収支払明細毎消費税外税合計
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 検収支払明細毎消費税内税合計
Column.Name: CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_SHIHARAI_TAX_UCHI_TOTAL ELSE 0 END

Column.DispName: 検収品名別支払金額合計
Column.Name: KENSHU_HINMEI_SHIHARAI_KINGAKU_TOTAL

Column.DispName: 検収品名別支払消費税外税合計
Column.Name: KENSHU_HINMEI_SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL

Column.DispName: 検収品名別支払消費税内税合計
Column.Name: KENSHU_HINMEI_SHIHARAI_TAX_UCHI_TOTAL

ISNULL(CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_TAX_SOTO ELSE 0 END, 0) + ISNULL(CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL ELSE 0 END, 0) + URIAGE_AMOUNT_TOTAL + HINMEI_URIAGE_KINGAKU_TOTAL + T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.HINMEI_URIAGE_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL

ISNULL(CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO ELSE 0 END, 0) + ISNULL(CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL ELSE 0 END, 0) + SHIHARAI_AMOUNT_TOTAL + HINMEI_SHIHARAI_KINGAKU_TOTAL + T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.HINMEI_SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL

Column.DispName: 検収売上金額合計(税込)
Column.Name: ISNULL(T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_URIAGE_AMOUNT_TOTAL, 0) + ISNULL(T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_URIAGE_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL, 0)

Column.DispName: 検収品名別売上金額合計(税込)
Column.Name: ISNULL(T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_HINMEI_URIAGE_KINGAKU_TOTAL, 0) + ISNULL(T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_HINMEI_URIAGE_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL, 0)

Column.DispName: 検収支払金額合計(税込)
Column.Name: ISNULL(T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_SHIHARAI_AMOUNT_TOTAL, 0) + ISNULL(T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL, 0)

Column.DispName: 検収品名別支払金額合計(税込)
Column.Name: ISNULL(T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_HINMEI_SHIHARAI_KINGAKU_TOTAL, 0) + ISNULL(T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KENSHU_HINMEI_SHIHARAI_TAX_SOTO_TOTAL, 0)
CASE T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.KAKUTEI_KBN WHEN 1 THEN '確定' WHEN 2 THEN '未確定' ELSE '' END

CASE WHEN T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_ZEI_KBN_CD IS NULL OR T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_ZEI_KBN_CD = '' THEN (CASE T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.DENPYOU_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN (CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.TAX_SOTO + T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_TAX_SOTO ELSE 0 END) WHEN 2 THEN (CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.TAX_SOTO + T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_TAX_SOTO ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) WHEN T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_ZEI_KBN_CD = 1 THEN T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_TAX_SOTO ELSE 0 END

CASE WHEN T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_ZEI_KBN_CD IS NULL OR T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_ZEI_KBN_CD = '' THEN (CASE T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.DENPYOU_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN (CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.TAX_UCHI + T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_TAX_UCHI ELSE 0 END) WHEN 2 THEN (CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.TAX_UCHI + T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_TAX_UCHI ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) WHEN T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_ZEI_KBN_CD = 2 THEN T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_TAX_UCHI ELSE 0 END
CASE T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_ZEI_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN '外税' WHEN 2 THEN '内税' WHEN 3 THEN '非課税' ELSE '' END

CASE T_KENSHU_DETAIL.DENPYOU_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN (CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN ISNULL(T_KENSHU_DETAIL.TAX_SOTO,0) + ISNULL(T_KENSHU_DETAIL.HINMEI_TAX_SOTO,0) ELSE 0 END) WHEN 2 THEN (CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN ISNULL(T_KENSHU_DETAIL.TAX_SOTO,0) + ISNULL(T_KENSHU_DETAIL.HINMEI_TAX_SOTO,0) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END

CASE T_KENSHU_DETAIL.DENPYOU_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN (CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN ISNULL(T_KENSHU_DETAIL.TAX_UCHI,0) + ISNULL(T_KENSHU_DETAIL.HINMEI_TAX_UCHI,0) ELSE 0 END) WHEN 2 THEN (CASE T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_ZEI_KEISAN_KBN_CD WHEN 3 THEN ISNULL(T_KENSHU_DETAIL.TAX_UCHI,0) + ISNULL(T_KENSHU_DETAIL.HINMEI_TAX_UCHI,0) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END
CASE T_KENSHU_DETAIL.HINMEI_ZEI_KBN_CD WHEN 1 THEN '外税' WHEN 2 THEN '内税' WHEN 3 THEN '非課税' ELSE '' END

OutputColumnSelect.JoinCondition: LEFT JOIN M_KYOTEN M_KYOTEN1 ON T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KYOTEN_CD = M_KYOTEN1.KYOTEN_CD
LEFT JOIN M_TORIHIKISAKI M_TORIHIKISAKI1 ON T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.TORIHIKISAKI_CD = M_TORIHIKISAKI1.TORIHIKISAKI_CD
LEFT JOIN M_GYOUSHA M_GYOUSHA1 ON T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.GYOUSHA_CD = M_GYOUSHA1.GYOUSHA_CD
LEFT JOIN M_GENBA M_GENBA1 ON T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.GYOUSHA_CD = M_GENBA1.GYOUSHA_CD AND T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.GENBA_CD = M_GENBA1.GENBA_CD
LEFT JOIN M_KEITAI_KBN M_KEITAI_KBN1 ON T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.KEITAI_KBN_CD = M_KEITAI_KBN1.KEITAI_KBN_CD
LEFT JOIN M_CONTENA_JOUKYOU M_CONTENA_JOUKYOU1 ON T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.CONTENA_SOUSA_CD = M_CONTENA_JOUKYOU1.CONTENA_JOUKYOU_CD
LEFT JOIN M_MANIFEST_SHURUI M_MANIFEST_SHURUI1 ON T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.MANIFEST_SHURUI_CD = M_MANIFEST_SHURUI1.MANIFEST_SHURUI_CD
LEFT JOIN M_MANIFEST_TEHAI M_MANIFEST_TEHAI1 ON T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.MANIFEST_TEHAI_CD = M_MANIFEST_TEHAI1.MANIFEST_TEHAI_CD
LEFT JOIN M_TORIHIKI_KBN M_TORIHIKI_KBN1 ON T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.URIAGE_TORIHIKI_KBN_CD = M_TORIHIKI_KBN1.TORIHIKI_KBN_CD
LEFT JOIN M_TORIHIKI_KBN M_TORIHIKI_KBN2 ON T_SHUKKA_ENTRY.SHIHARAI_TORIHIKI_KBN_CD = M_TORIHIKI_KBN2.TORIHIKI_KBN_CD
LEFT JOIN M_DENPYOU_KBN M_DENPYOU_KBN1 ON T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.DENPYOU_KBN_CD = M_DENPYOU_KBN1.DENPYOU_KBN_CD
LEFT JOIN M_DENPYOU_KBN M_DENPYOU_KBN2 ON T_KENSHU_DETAIL.DENPYOU_KBN_CD = M_DENPYOU_KBN2.DENPYOU_KBN_CD
LEFT JOIN M_YOUKI M_YOUKI1 ON T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.YOUKI_CD = M_YOUKI1.YOUKI_CD
LEFT JOIN M_UNIT M_UNIT1 ON T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.UNIT_CD = M_UNIT1.UNIT_CD
LEFT JOIN M_UNIT M_UNIT2 ON T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.NISUGATA_UNIT_CD = M_UNIT2.UNIT_CD
LEFT JOIN M_UNIT M_UNIT3 ON T_KENSHU_DETAIL.UNIT_CD = M_UNIT3.UNIT_CD

LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM T_MANIFEST_ENTRY WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0) T_MANIFEST_ENTRY ON T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.SYSTEM_ID = T_MANIFEST_ENTRY.RENKEI_SYSTEM_ID AND T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.DETAIL_SYSTEM_ID = T_MANIFEST_ENTRY.RENKEI_MEISAI_SYSTEM_ID AND T_MANIFEST_ENTRY.RENKEI_DENSHU_KBN_CD = 2

LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SYSTEM_ID, SEQ, DETAIL_SYSTEM_ID, ZAIKO_HINMEI_COUNT, CASE WHEN ZAIKO_HINMEI_COUNT = 1 THEN ZAIKO_HINMEI_CD ELSE '' END ZAIKO_HINMEI_CD, CASE WHEN ZAIKO_HINMEI_COUNT = 1 THEN ZAIKO_HINMEI_NAME ELSE '複数在庫品名' END ZAIKO_HINMEI_NAME FROM (SELECT SYSTEM_ID, SEQ, DETAIL_SYSTEM_ID, MIN(ZAIKO_HINMEI_CD) ZAIKO_HINMEI_CD, MIN(ZAIKO_HINMEI_NAME) ZAIKO_HINMEI_NAME, COUNT(*) ZAIKO_HINMEI_COUNT FROM T_ZAIKO_HINMEI_HURIWAKE WHERE DENSHU_KBN_CD = '2' GROUP BY SYSTEM_ID, SEQ, DETAIL_SYSTEM_ID ) T ) T_ZAIKO_HINMEI_HURIWAKE ON T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.SYSTEM_ID = T_ZAIKO_HINMEI_HURIWAKE.SYSTEM_ID AND T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.SEQ = T_ZAIKO_HINMEI_HURIWAKE.SEQ AND T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.DETAIL_SYSTEM_ID = T_ZAIKO_HINMEI_HURIWAKE.DETAIL_SYSTEM_ID
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MH.HINMEI_CD, MH.SHURUI_CD, MS.SHURUI_NAME_RYAKU FROM M_HINMEI MH INNER JOIN M_SHURUI MS ON MS.SHURUI_CD = MH.SHURUI_CD ) M_SHURUI ON M_SHURUI.HINMEI_CD = T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_CD
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MH.HINMEI_CD, MH.BUNRUI_CD, MB.BUNRUI_NAME_RYAKU FROM M_HINMEI MH INNER JOIN M_BUNRUI MB ON MB.BUNRUI_CD = MH.BUNRUI_CD ) M_BUNRUI ON M_BUNRUI.HINMEI_CD = T_SHUKKA_DETAIL.HINMEI_CD
